name: 尼古拉斯·德库洛斯
name_full: 尼古拉斯·德库洛斯 Nicholas DeCoulos
introduction: Nicholas (AKA:Nicholas "Dex" DeCoulos landed his first ever gig in 2020, as a main role character for a 2-episode Pilot of an upcoming Nigerian-Canadian television series named : "OMOBELLA PALACE".He later participated in numerous TV series and films such as : "DARK SIDE OF THE RING" , "LOVE YOU TO DEATH" , "HOURS TO KILL", "OMOBELLA PALACE" (Season 1) "IT'S ABOUT TIME" . He also recently wrapped up his first ever film :"SWITCHED AT DEATH" in a key role.Next projects that followed in 2023: "PARANORMAL REVENGE", "THANKSGIVING" "TORONTO THE GOOD" "LUXE LISTINGS TORONTO" & "TRAP" to name a few...- IMDb Mini Biography By: NDThe main thing about me is that my Mediterranean temperament guides me when applying myself passionately in acting. I have been acting for the past 4+ years. My background in the Greek Military has helped me gain roles as a detective and a leader in the Secret Service (Captain of the Mossad). Being stereotyped is not what I am looking for as an actor. I prefer diverse roles and I have had the opportunity to perform as: a chef, a husband and father in a mixed family, a bar owner with a slight taste of mafia, a juror, a wrestler & etc.My main influencers are: Bruce Willis,Mel Gibson, Harrison Ford, Al Pacino, Samuel L.Jackson, Robert De Niro, Brad Pitt, Leonardo Di Caprio as well as the great Martin Scorcese, Ridley Scott and Steven Spielberg.
